title: Someone is literally in my account right now
body: I changed my password and everything about my account and this person is still in my account and I'm very spooked.

replies.body: Is it you? How high are you?
nah man i hear him in a VC and everything and he sent random messages to my friend and im spooked because he wont go away

Log into the account and he wont be able to log in, and while you're doing that change the email and password to the account to be safe. Change email first so just incase he has control of your email( which might be the problem he might've been able to see the password) and then the password
/x/ on the boards, I like it
